trigger_event: On every `git push` to a feature branch
success_criteria: Build successful; 90% unit test coverage on new code; 100% unit test pass rate; SonarQube quality gate passes (no new bugs or code smells).
failure_action: Block pull request merge; Post failure report to PR.
escalation_procedure: PR author is responsible for fixing issues.
business_impact: Prevents defects and code quality issues from entering the main branch.

trigger_event: After successful deployment to the Staging environment
success_criteria: 100% of P0 and P1 E2E tests pass; Performance benchmark test (REQ-PERF-DTR-002) passes; No new critical or high severity vulnerabilities found by DAST scan.
failure_action: Block promotion to Production; Create P0 bug ticket; Alert On-call SRE and QA Lead.
tools_used: Playwright, xUnit, OWASP ZAP, GitHub Actions
business_impact: Prevents major functional, performance, or security regressions from reaching production.

success_criteria: All P0/P1 E2E tests passing; No outstanding P0/P1 bugs; All security vulnerabilities have a remediation plan; Documentation is complete; Rollback plan is tested and verified.
responsible_team: Product Owner, QA Lead, Tech Lead
business_impact: Final business and technical sign-off to ensure a high-quality release.
